short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shorten your Gmail labels so parent labels are not displayed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nesting gmail labels results in an unnecessarily long display that includes both parent and child labels. This will trim down the label names so you only see the child.
